subject: Empire State Building (Manhattan, NY)
Lighting
Endangered and Extinct Species
Art
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: The artists Louie Psihoyos and Travis Threlkel projected digital images of endangered species onto the Empire State Building in an event meant to draw attention to the creatures’ plight.
snippet: The artists Louie Psihoyos and Travis Threlkel projected digital images of endangered species onto the Empire State Building in an event meant to draw attention to the creatures’ plight.
